rows.label: qst100902_msg0003
rows.name:
Wake up, Therida...
What should I do...?

rows.label: qst100902_msg0004
rows.name:
Thank you... Wait, come to think
of it, a long time ago, she told
me about a reviving medicine...

rows.label: qst100902_msg0006
rows.name:
Therida said that if you have
Amethyst Oonira, you can wake up
someone who has lost consciousness.

rows.label: qst100902_msg0007
rows.name:
Could you please bring me
some Amethyst Oonira?
